threats.strict_mode_response: Fail-closed on malformed graph payloads.
threats.hardened_mode_response: Fail-closed with bounded diagnostics and incident evidence.

threats.strict_mode_response: Fail-closed on unknown conflicting graph metadata.
threats.hardened_mode_response: Quarantine unsupported metadata and fail-closed when contract impact is unknown.

threats.strict_mode_response: Fail-closed on unsupported schema/version claims.
threats.hardened_mode_response: Reject downgrade/upgrade ambiguity with explicit remediation hints.

threats.strict_mode_response: Fail-closed when graph size exceeds strict policy budgets.
threats.hardened_mode_response: Apply bounded caps and reject once clamp budget is exhausted.

threats.strict_mode_response: Abort mutation path and fail-closed on invariant break.
threats.hardened_mode_response: Rollback to last valid snapshot, then fail-closed with audit log.

threats.strict_mode_response: Fail-closed when provenance anchors, signer identity, or lineage links are forged.
threats.hardened_mode_response: Reject forged provenance claims, emit deterministic contamination incident report, and block execution.
mitigations: anchor hash validation against allowlisted source manifests

threats.strict_mode_response: Fail-closed on malformed view construction inputs.
threats.hardened_mode_response: Fail-closed with bounded diagnostics for malformed view inputs.

threats.strict_mode_response: Fail-closed on ambiguous filter or projection metadata.
threats.hardened_mode_response: Quarantine unsupported metadata and preserve deterministic view semantics.

threats.strict_mode_response: Fail-closed on incompatible view contract versions.
threats.hardened_mode_response: Reject unsupported version skew with deterministic diagnostics.

threats.strict_mode_response: Fail-closed when view expansion exceeds strict limits.
threats.hardened_mode_response: Bound iterator/materialization costs and reject after budget exhaustion.

threats.strict_mode_response: Fail-closed when cache invalidation invariants are violated.
threats.hardened_mode_response: Reset affected view cache segments and fail-closed with audit evidence.

threats.strict_mode_response: Fail-closed on malformed backend configuration payloads.
threats.hardened_mode_response: Fail-closed with bounded diagnostics for malformed backend configuration.

threats.strict_mode_response: Fail-closed on ambiguous backend metadata and routing hints.
threats.hardened_mode_response: Quarantine unsupported metadata and refuse ambiguous dispatch routes.

threats.strict_mode_response: Fail-closed on unsupported backend API versions.
threats.hardened_mode_response: Reject incompatible versions and emit compatibility drift diagnostics.

threats.strict_mode_response: Fail-closed on route search/dispatch costs above strict budget.
threats.hardened_mode_response: Bound dispatch search costs and reject when quotas are exceeded.

threats.strict_mode_response: Fail-closed when dispatch cache state violates determinism invariants.
threats.hardened_mode_response: Reset dispatch cache and fail-closed with deterministic incident record.

threats.strict_mode_response: Fail-closed on competing backend routes with equal precedence.
threats.hardened_mode_response: Apply deterministic allowlisted fallback route with full audit trace.

threats.strict_mode_response: Fail-closed on any attempt to bypass signed policy constraints or unsafe-code prohibitions.
threats.hardened_mode_response: Ignore unauthorized overrides, emit deterministic policy-bypass incident evidence, and halt route execution.

threats.strict_mode_response: Fail-closed on malformed conversion payload structures.
threats.hardened_mode_response: Fail-closed with bounded diagnostics and conversion incident ledger.

threats.strict_mode_response: Fail-closed on ambiguous node/edge attribute precedence.
threats.hardened_mode_response: Quarantine unsupported metadata and preserve deterministic precedence order.

threats.strict_mode_response: Fail-closed on unsupported conversion schema versions.
threats.hardened_mode_response: Reject incompatible schema versions with deterministic diagnostics.

threats.strict_mode_response: Fail-closed on conversion expansion above strict budget.
threats.hardened_mode_response: Bound conversion memory/time costs and reject when clamps are exhausted.

threats.strict_mode_response: Fail-closed when conversion mutates graph state outside contract.
threats.hardened_mode_response: Rollback conversion transaction and emit deterministic audit record.

threats.strict_mode_response: Fail-closed on duplicate/conflicting attribute namespaces.
threats.hardened_mode_response: Reject conflicting namespaces after deterministic canonicalization attempt.

threats.strict_mode_response: Fail-closed on malformed weighted shortest-path inputs.
threats.hardened_mode_response: Fail-closed with bounded diagnostics on malformed algorithm inputs.

threats.strict_mode_response: Fail-closed on ambiguous weight metadata or route hints.
threats.hardened_mode_response: Quarantine unsupported metadata and preserve deterministic route semantics.

threats.strict_mode_response: Fail-closed on unsupported algorithm contract versions.
threats.hardened_mode_response: Reject incompatible versions with deterministic remediation diagnostics.

threats.strict_mode_response: Fail-closed when path search exceeds strict complexity budgets.
threats.hardened_mode_response: Bound expansion work and abort once bounded clamps are exhausted.

threats.strict_mode_response: Fail-closed when path state cache/invariants diverge from contract.
threats.hardened_mode_response: Reset path state and fail-closed with deterministic incident report.

threats.strict_mode_response: Fail-closed on adversarial graph classes outside strict budget envelope.
threats.hardened_mode_response: Apply bounded admission checks and reject hostile graph classes.

threats.strict_mode_response: Fail-closed on malformed read/write payload lines.
threats.hardened_mode_response: Fail-closed with bounded diagnostics for malformed line sets.

threats.strict_mode_response: Fail-closed on ambiguous format metadata and delimiter semantics.
threats.hardened_mode_response: Quarantine unsupported metadata and preserve deterministic serialization contract.

threats.strict_mode_response: Fail-closed on unsupported read/write format versions.
threats.hardened_mode_response: Reject incompatible format versions with deterministic diagnostics.

threats.strict_mode_response: Fail-closed on parse/write resource usage over strict budget.
threats.hardened_mode_response: Bound parse buffers and reject once resource clamp thresholds are exceeded.

threats.strict_mode_response: Fail-closed when read/write operations violate graph state invariants.
threats.hardened_mode_response: Rollback partial import/export state and emit deterministic incident evidence.

threats.strict_mode_response: Fail-closed on malformed generator parameter payloads.
threats.hardened_mode_response: Fail-closed with bounded diagnostics for malformed generator inputs.

threats.strict_mode_response: Fail-closed on ambiguous generator metadata or seed semantics.
threats.hardened_mode_response: Quarantine unsupported metadata and preserve deterministic generation outcomes.

threats.strict_mode_response: Fail-closed on unsupported generator contract versions.
threats.hardened_mode_response: Reject incompatible versions with deterministic diagnostics.

threats.strict_mode_response: Fail-closed on generation workload above strict budget.
threats.hardened_mode_response: Apply bounded size/time clamps and reject after quota exhaustion.

threats.strict_mode_response: Fail-closed when generated graph violates structural invariants.
threats.hardened_mode_response: Discard generated state and emit deterministic incident report.

threats.strict_mode_response: Fail-closed on generator parameters that imply adversarial complexity.
threats.hardened_mode_response: Clamp parameter ranges and reject hostile generation requests.

threats.strict_mode_response: Fail-closed on malformed runtime config/env payloads.
threats.hardened_mode_response: Fail-closed with bounded diagnostics for malformed runtime config.

threats.strict_mode_response: Fail-closed on ambiguous dependency/runtime metadata.
threats.hardened_mode_response: Quarantine unsupported metadata and reject ambiguous runtime selection.

threats.strict_mode_response: Fail-closed on unsupported runtime/dependency version envelopes.
threats.hardened_mode_response: Reject incompatible version combinations with deterministic diagnostics.

threats.strict_mode_response: Fail-closed on runtime config expansion over strict budgets.
threats.hardened_mode_response: Bound runtime probing and diagnostics overhead via explicit quotas.

threats.strict_mode_response: Fail-closed when runtime policy state diverges from contract.
threats.hardened_mode_response: Reset runtime policy cache and fail-closed with evidence ledger.

threats.strict_mode_response: Fail-closed on ambiguous optional dependency backend routes.
threats.hardened_mode_response: Apply deterministic allowlisted fallback route with audit trace.

threats.strict_mode_response: Fail-closed on malformed conformance fixture payloads.
threats.hardened_mode_response: Fail-closed with bounded diagnostics for malformed fixture batches.

threats.strict_mode_response: Fail-closed on ambiguous fixture metadata and oracle references.
threats.hardened_mode_response: Quarantine unsupported metadata and reject ambiguous comparator routes.

threats.strict_mode_response: Fail-closed on unsupported fixture/comparator schema versions.
threats.hardened_mode_response: Reject incompatible schema versions with deterministic diagnostics.

threats.strict_mode_response: Fail-closed on fixture execution workloads above strict budget.
threats.hardened_mode_response: Bound fixture execution batches and reject once budget is exhausted.

threats.strict_mode_response: Fail-closed when comparator state invalidates deterministic parity claims.
threats.hardened_mode_response: Reset comparator state and fail-closed with deterministic incident report.

threats.strict_mode_response: Fail-closed on ambiguous or mixed-origin fixture/oracle lineage claims.
threats.hardened_mode_response: Quarantine contaminated fixture bundles, emit deterministic contamination proofs, and reject comparator execution.
